languages.text: "Я, впрочем, не считаю, что это плохо. Старик Винтерскейл, вероятно, слегка обидится, Чорда — насторожится. Но вы только-только заступили на пост, в Просторе Коронус большинство еще даже не знает о смерти Леди Теодоры. Нужно дать понять всем, что знамя фон Валанциус реет столь же высоко, как и раньше".

traits.locale_text: "Я, впрочем, не считаю, что это плохо. Старик Винтерскейл, вероятно, слегка обидится, Чорда — насторожится. Но вы только-только заступили на пост, в Просторе Коронус большинство еще даже не знает о смерти леди Теодоры. Нужно дать понять всем, что знамя фон Валанциус реет столь же высоко, как и раньше".

languages.text: "I do not see that as a bad thing, necessarily. Old man Winterscale may take slight offence. Chorda will be put on her guard. But you have just risen to prominence and most people in the Koronus Expanse have not even heard about Lady Theodora's departure yet. It must be made clear that the banner of von Valancius soars as high as ever."
languages.original_text: "Я, впрочем, не считаю, что это плохо. Старик Винтерскейл, вероятно, слегка обидится, Чорда — насторожится. Но вы только-только заступили на пост, в Просторе Коронус большинство еще даже не знает о смерти Леди Теодоры. Нужно дать понять всем, что знамя фон Валанциус реет столь же высоко, как и раньше".

traits.locale_text: "This is not necessary a bad thing. Old man Winterscale may take slight offense, Chorda will become wary. But you have just risen to prominence and most people in the Koronus expanse have not even heard about Lady Theodora's departure yet. It must be made clear that the banner of von Valancius soars as high as ever."

"This is not necessary a bad thing. Old man Winterscale may take slight offense, Chorda will become wary. But you have just risen to prominence and most people in the Koronus expanse have not even heard about Lady Theodora's departure yet. It must be made clear that the banner of von Valancius soars as high as ever."

"I do not see that as a bad thing, necessarily. Old man Winterscale may take slight offense. Chorda will be put on his guard. But you have just risen to prominence and most people in the Koronus Expanse have not even heard about Lady Theodora's departure yet. It must be made clear that the banner of von Valancius soars as high as ever."

"I do not see that as a bad thing, necessarily. Old man Winterscale may take slight offense. Chorda will be put on his guard. But you have just risen to prominence and most people in the Koronus Expanse have not even heard about Lady Theodora's departure yet. It must be made clear that the banner of von Valancius soars as high as ever."

"I do not see that as a bad thing, necessarily. Old man Winterscale may take slight offence. Chorda will be put on her guard. But you have just risen to prominence and most people in the Koronus Expanse have not even heard about Lady Theodora's departure yet. It must be made clear that the banner of von Valancius soars as high as ever."

languages.text: «Eso no tiene por qué ser malo. Es cierto que el viejo Winterscale probablemente se ofenda un poco y Chorda se pondrá a la defensiva, pero acaba de ascender a un cargo importante y muchos en la Extensión de Koronus ni siquiera saben de la muerte de Lady Theodora. Debemos dejar claro que el estandarte de los von Valancius ondea tan alto como siempre».
languages.original_text: "I do not see that as a bad thing, necessarily. Old man Winterscale may take slight offence. Chorda will be put on her guard. But you have just risen to prominence and most people in the Koronus Expanse have not even heard about Lady Theodora's departure yet. It must be made clear that the banner of von Valancius soars as high as ever."

traits.locale_text: «Eso no tiene por qué ser malo. Es cierto que el viejo Winterscale probablemente se ofenda un poco y Chorda se pondrá a la defensiva, pero acaba de ascender a un cargo importante y muchos en la Extensión de Koronus ni siquiera saben de la muerte de Lady Theodora. Debemos dejar claro que el estandarte de los von Valancius ondea tan alto como siempre».

languages.text: “不过我认为，这倒未必是件坏事。老温特斯凯尔或许会不太高兴，库尔达或许也会提防您，但您才刚刚崭露头角，科罗努斯扩区绝大部分人甚至根本不知道西奥多拉夫人已经去世。必须让所有人明白，冯·瓦兰修斯的旗帜依然会像以往一样高高飘扬。”
languages.original_text: "I do not see that as a bad thing, necessarily. Old man Winterscale may take slight offence. Chorda will be put on her guard. But you have just risen to prominence and most people in the Koronus Expanse have not even heard about Lady Theodora's departure yet. It must be made clear that the banner of von Valancius soars as high as ever."

traits.locale_text: “不过我认为，这倒未必是件坏事。老温特斯凯尔或许会不太高兴，库尔达或许也会提防您，但您才刚刚崭露头角，科罗努斯星域绝大部分人甚至根本不知道西奥多拉夫人已经去世。必须让所有人明白，冯·瓦兰修斯的旗帜依然会像以往一样高高飘扬。”

languages.text: 「必ずしもそれが悪いことではありません。老ウィンタースケールは気を悪くするでしょう。チョーダは警戒するはずです。ただ、陛下はまだ注目され始めたばかりで、コロヌス・エクスパンスの多くの人間は、シオドーラ様の死すらも知ってはいないのです。フォン・ヴァランシウスの旗が今までより高く掲げられているのだと、ハッキリさせなければいけません」
languages.original_text: "I do not see that as a bad thing, necessarily. Old man Winterscale may take slight offence. Chorda will be put on her guard. But you have just risen to prominence and most people in the Koronus Expanse have not even heard about Lady Theodora's departure yet. It must be made clear that the banner of von Valancius soars as high as ever."

traits.locale_text: 「必ずしもそれが悪いことではありません。老ウィンタースケールは気を悪くするでしょう。チョーダは警戒するはずです。ただ、陛下はまだ注目され始めたばかりで、コロヌス・エクスパンスの多くの人間は、シオドーラ様の死すらも知ってはいないのです。フォン・ヴァランシウスの旗が今までより高く掲げられているのだと、ハッキリさせなければいけません」

languages.text: "Ich würde das nicht grundsätzlich als etwas Schlechtes betrachten. Der alte Winterzunder könnte sich ein bisschen daran stören. Chorda wird die Wachsamkeit erhöhen. Aber Ihr werdet gerade erst bekannt, und die meisten in der Koronus-Ausdehnung haben von Lady Theodoras Dahinscheiden noch nicht einmal gehört. Es muss klar sein, dass das Banner derer von Valancius unverändert gehisst bleibt."
languages.original_text: "I do not see that as a bad thing, necessarily. Old man Winterscale may take slight offence. Chorda will be put on her guard. But you have just risen to prominence and most people in the Koronus Expanse have not even heard about Lady Theodora's departure yet. It must be made clear that the banner of von Valancius soars as high as ever."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde das nicht grundsätzlich als etwas Schlechtes betrachten. Der alte Winterzunder könnte sich ein bisschen daran stören. Chorda wird die Wachsamkeit erhöhen. Aber Ihr werdet gerade erst bekannt, und die meisten in der Koronus-Ausdehnung haben von Lady Theodoras Dahinscheiden noch nicht einmal gehört. Es muss klar sein, dass das Banner derer von Valancius unverändert gehisst bleibt."

languages.text: « Ce qui n'est pas nécessairement une mauvaise chose, à mes yeux. Le vieux Winterscale risque de s'offenser légèrement, tandis que Chorda se mettra sur ses gardes. Cependant, il ne faut pas oublier que vous venez d'atteindre une place de premier plan et que la plupart des habitants des Étendues de Koronus ne sont même pas au courant de la mort de dame Théodora. Vous devez montrer à tous que la bannière des von Valancius flotte aussi fièrement qu'avant. »
languages.original_text: "I do not see that as a bad thing, necessarily. Old man Winterscale may take slight offence. Chorda will be put on her guard. But you have just risen to prominence and most people in the Koronus Expanse have not even heard about Lady Theodora's departure yet. It must be made clear that the banner of von Valancius soars as high as ever."

traits.locale_text: « Ce qui n'est pas nécessairement une mauvaise chose, à mes yeux. Le vieux Winterscale risque de s'offenser légèrement, tandis que Chorda se mettra sur ses gardes. Cependant, il ne faut pas oublier que vous venez d'atteindre une place de premier plan et que la plupart des habitants des Étendues de Koronus ne sont même pas au courant de la mort de dame Théodora. Vous devez montrer à tous que la bannière des von Valancius flotte aussi fièrement qu'avant. »

languages.text: "Bunu ille de kötü bir şey olarak görmemek lazım tabii. İhtiyar Winterscale biraz alınabilir. Chorda kendini korumaya alır. Siz önemli bir makama yeni çıktınız. Koronus Enginliği'ndeki çoğu insan, Leydi Theodora'nın vefatını henüz duymadı. Von Valancius sancağının hâlâ yükseklerde dalgalandığını herkes görmeli."
languages.original_text: "I do not see that as a bad thing, necessarily. Old man Winterscale may take slight offence. Chorda will be put on her guard. But you have just risen to prominence and most people in the Koronus Expanse have not even heard about Lady Theodora's departure yet. It must be made clear that the banner of von Valancius soars as high as ever."

traits.locale_text: "Ben bunu kötü bir şey olarak görmem şahsen. İhtiyar Winterscale biraz alınabilir. Chorda kendini korumaya alır ama siz önemli bir mevkiye yeni yükseldiniz ve Koronus Enginliği'ndeki çoğu insan daha Leydi Theodora'nın ölümünü duymadı bile. Von Valancius sancağının hâlâ yükseklerde dalgalandığını herkes görmeli."
